Title: Episode 3
Plot: Kim has stepped in to cover a night shift and is looking forward to a quiet few hours, when a new admission and the surprise appearance of an emotional Den puts paid to any plans of a kip. With Dr Moore forced to divert from her regional sports awards dinner and attend an emergency a happy ending looks possible, but B4 isn't the sort of place where things run smoothly.
ParentalRatingReason: M Offensive language,sexual themes and disturbing behaviour
Writer: Jo Brand ,  Vicki Pepperdine ,  Joanna Scanlan
